io.artframework

Interface CombinedResult

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Result
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    FutureResult
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultCombinedResult, DefaultFutureResult

    public interface CombinedResult
extends Result
    The CombinedResult combines multiple results and target results and dynamically adjusts its own result based off the results contained within.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static CombinedResult empty(java.lang.String... messages)
      Creates a new empty combined result.
      static CombinedResult of(Result... results)
      Creates a new combined result from the given results.
      <TTarget> java.util.Collection<TargetResult<TTarget,?>> ofTarget(java.lang.Class<TTarget> targetClass)
      Gets all results of the specific target type.
      <TTarget> java.util.Collection<TargetResult<TTarget,?>> ofTarget(Target<TTarget> target)
      Gets all results of the specific target.
      java.util.Collection<Result> results()
      Returns the list of results in this combined result.

      • Methods inherited from interface io.artframework.Result

        cancelled, combine, combine, error, error, error, failure, failure, future, messages, of, of, status, success, success, with

    • Method Detail

      • empty

        static CombinedResult empty(java.lang.String... messages)
        Creates a new empty combined result.
        Specified by:
        empty in interface Result
        Parameters:
        messages - optional messages to store in the empty result
        Returns:
        new empty combined result

      • of

        static CombinedResult of(Result... results)
        Creates a new combined result from the given results.
        Parameters:
        results - the results that make up the combined result
        Returns:
        a new combined result with the given results

      • results

        java.util.Collection<Result> results()
        Returns the list of results in this combined result.

        The list may contain both types of results: Result and TargetResult. You can use the ofTarget(...) methods to get all results for a specific target.

        Returns:
        list of results inside this combined result

      • ofTarget

        <TTarget> java.util.Collection<TargetResult<TTarget,?>> ofTarget(Target<TTarget> target)
        Gets all results of the specific target.

        You can create a combined result from the list of results to easily check the success status for all of the target results. CombinedResult#of(Result...)#success()

        Type Parameters:
        TTarget - type of the target
        Parameters:
        target - the target source to get the results for
        Returns:
        a list of results of the given target. the list may be empty but is never null.

      • ofTarget

        <TTarget> java.util.Collection<TargetResult<TTarget,?>> ofTarget(java.lang.Class<TTarget> targetClass)
        Gets all results of the specific target type.

        You can create a combined result from the list of results to easily check the success status for all of the target results. CombinedResult#of(Result...)#success()

        Type Parameters:
        TTarget - type of the target
        Parameters:
        targetClass - class of the target type
        Returns:
        a list of results of the given target type. the list may be empty but is never null.
